ADS1015

Texas Instruments Analog-Digital Converter

  • Device address 73
  • Address type 7-bit
  • Little Endian

Addr 0

16-bytes

Read-only

ADC Value

Conversion register contains the result of the last conversion

Addr 1

16-bytes

Set the channel to read

This sets the channel for reading analog voltage

[14:12] | 3-bytes
Inaccessible

Setup programmable gain

This sets the programmable gain for reading analog voltage

[11:9] | 3-bytes
Write-only

Set the operating mode

This bit controls the operating mode

[8:8] | 1-byte
Write-only

Setup sample rate for reading analog voltage

This sets the samples-per-second value

[7:5] | 3-bytes
Write-only

Functions

  • analog.read - Reads the analog voltage in Volts
